mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.num AS "num", a.cude AS "cude", a.name AS "name", a.assessment_city as "assessmentCity", a.is_enable AS "isEnable", a.full_name as "fullName", a.contacts as "contacts", a.tel as "tel", a.province as "province", a.area as "area", a.city as "city", a.address as "address", a.remarks as "remarks", a.alternate_1 as "alternate_1", a.alternate_2 as "alternate_2", a.alternate_3 as "alternate_3", a.alternate_4 as "alternate_4", a.alternate_5 as "alternate_5", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.my_create_date AS "myCreateDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT id ,num, cude , name,assessment_city,is_enable,full_name,contacts,tel,province,area,city,address,remarks,alternate_1 alternate_2,alternate_3,alternate_4,alternate_5,alternate_6,my_create_date FROM demo a
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')

SELECT
FROM demo a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO demo( id, num, cude, name, assessment_city, is_enable, full_name, contacts, tel, province, area, city, address, remarks, alternate_1, alternate_2, alternate_3, alternate_4, alternate_5, alternate_6, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, my_create_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{num}, #{cude}, #{name}, #{assessmentCity}, #{isEnable}, #{fullName}, #{contacts}, #{tel}, #{province}, #{area}, #{city}, #{address}, #{remarks}, #{alternate_1}, #{alternate_2}, #{alternate_3}, #{alternate_4}, #{alternate_5}, #{alternate_6}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{myCreateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE demo SET num =#{num}, cude =#{cude}, name = #{name}, assessment_city =#{assessmentCity}, is_enable =#{isEnable}, full_name =#{fullName}, contacts =#{contacts}, tel =#{tel}, province =#{province}, area =#{area}, city =#{city}, address =#{address}, remarks =#{remarks}, alternate_1 =#{alternate_1}, alternate_1 =#{alternate_2}, alternate_1 =#{alternate_3}, alternate_1 =#{alternate_4}, alternate_1 =#{alternate_5}, alternate_1 =#{alternate_6}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, my_create_date =#{myCreateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
